description.full: A young boy named Kurt finds himself stranded on a peculiar planet, and he must find his way home. Finding help from unlikely allies and the curious tools in his backpack, Kurt must use gravity-defying beams to conquer every platform and solve every puzzle on this strange journey. Featuring over 12 hours of action-adventure gameplay and fully-realized co-op, players are poised to experience a beautiful world set to an evocative soundtrack. With twenty-two different locations, dozens of foes and hundreds of secrets, Pid is like your world… only different.
description.short: A boy named Kurt finds himself stranded on a peculiar planet and must find his way home. Finding help from unlikely allies and curious tools in his backpack, Kurt must conquer every platform and solve every puzzle. Featuring well over 12 hours of single player and co-op with twenty-two different locations, dozens of foes and hundreds of secrets, Pid is like your world… only different.
